Name: prov:Entity
Description: Thing with some fixed aspects; may be physical, digital, or conceptual.

Name: prov:Activity
Description: Something that occurs over time and acts upon entities.

Name: prov:Agent
Description: Something that bears responsibility for an activity taking place.

Name: prov:Plan
Description: A plan that guides the execution of an activity.

Name: prov:Role
Description: The function of an entity or agent in an activity.

Name: prov:Bundle
Description: A named set of provenance descriptions.

Name: prov:Generation
Description: An instantaneous event marking entity creation.

Name: prov:Usage
Description: An event of an entity being used.

Name: prov:Communication
Description: Event marking information flow between activities.

Name: prov:Association
Description: Links an activity to an agent.

Name: prov:Attribution
Description: Assigns credit for an entity to an agent.

Name: prov:wasGeneratedBy
Description: Links an entity to the activity that generated it.

Name: prov:used
Description: Indicates an activity used an entity.

Name: prov:wasInvalidatedBy
Description: Entity became invalid due to an activity.

Name: prov:wasAssociatedWith
Description: Associates an agent with an activity.

Name: prov:wasAttributedTo
Description: Credits an agent for an entityâ€™s existence.

Name: prov:value
Description: Literal value held by an entity.
